UPDATE PIST_EMP_COURTCASE_REPLY_DTL SET NUM_MAIN_SL_NO=?, STR_CASE_NUMBER=?, STR_CASE_SUBJECT=?, STR_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE=?, NUM_DEPT_ID=?, DT_REQ_IDENTIFIED_DATE=?, DT_LETTER_DATE=?, STR_LETTER_NO=?, DT_RPLY_REQ_BEF_DATE=?, STR_INFORM_VERIFY=?, DT_VARIFY_DATE=?, STR_INCHARGE_REMARKS=?,STR_INCHARGE_NAME=?, STR_INCHARGE_DESIG=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GNUM_SEAT_ID=?, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE NUM_MAIN_SL_NO=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
